description: Proprietor Paul Bain looks in on handsome Cliff Parker as the piano tuner impeccably tweaks the fine instruments. Cliff prides himself with how he takes his time modulating the pianos and whatever perfection he demands of himself, he expects of others. He soon grows impatient waiting for input from Paul ... 'cuz when the roguish craftsman wants something, he wants it right away. Initially ticked off by Bain, Cliff's annoyance turns to desire as he takes in the sexy blond's taut, muscular body and deep blue eyes. Screw the pianos. Cliff wants Paul and he wastes no time as they hook up, entwining each other in unbridled and heated manlust.
title: Command Performance, Scene #02
